clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Being investigated for the treatment of Herpes labialis infections cold sores

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Resveratrol a phytoalexin has been found to inhibit herpes simplex virus types 1 and 2 HSV 1 and HSV 2 replication in a dose dependent reversible manner although this is only one of its many pharmaceutical properties In some countries where there is higher consumption of red wine there appears to be a lower incidence of heart disease Other benefits of resveratrol include its anti inflammatory and antioxidant effects In preclinical studies Resveratrol has been found to have potential anticancer properties
